description:
Gao`s friends begin to suspect that there`s more to the GGG Cup Tournament than meets the eye. Noboru confronts Gao about his secretive behavior during their semi-final match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Burn Brightly, Noboru! A Tear-Soaked Serious Buddyfight!
Moeyo Noboru! Namida no Gachinko Fight!!
燃えよノボル! 涙のガチンコファイト!!
